Detailed Description

Compute some statistics about series of values

This class acts like as a stream on which series of values may be inserted. The object computes basic statistics (count,total,average,standard deviation, min, max) of a series of double floating point values.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef double Util::Statistic::value_type

Type of value

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Util::Statistic::Statistic (  )  [inline]

Default cstor All basic statistics are set to 0. Min is set to the maximal value of value_type and max set to the minimal value.
